1.content: Who should we start with?
1.title: Staring character.

111.content: X sighed returning from his last mission pondering Berkanas words of a curse placed on him. Sure she seemed to have that kind of magical power.. but what could she really do to him now that he was retired? Walking into his room he noted something seemed off...
111.title: After Xtreme 2

111111.content:
X felt something tickling the back of his neck reaching back to scratch at it, X discovers what feels like hair tickling it's way down his neck. growing longer and longer. Tossing off his helmet the hair only seemed to increase it's rate of growth. Spiky bangs framing his faces as the rest fell down his back trailing on the ground a bit. "What in the.." X said frowning at what had happened.

Looking around nothing else seemed to have changed. "So she made my hair long?" X said worried looking to his bath room then back to the door leading out.
111111.title: Hair?

1111111.content:
"I'll just cut the hair then head over to medical for a scan." X said walking to the bathroom. Hair dragging on the floor as he turns on the lights to the bathroom he turns left to his mirror and finds another shock. His black hair lightened to a brown color. Spikes framing his head.

"This can't be normal." X said frowning searching his rest room for scissors.
1111111.title: Where are you scissors?

11111112.content:
Not finding anything to use t cut the hair X gave up closing the mirror and cabinet combo only to stare in the mirror. "My eyes..."

Indeed while looking for the scissors X never noticed his Iris's changing color from thier usual green to a rounder brown matching his new hair color. "I have to get to Lifesaver... but better not in my armor.." X said warping his armor off to security levels that held his armor. "First to hide all this hair.."
11111112.title: How does Zero put up with this?

choices: He tries to use his helmet to cover the hair
111111122.title: Other

1111111221.title: He tries to use his helmet to cover the hair

1112.content:
X then felt quite odd. It was as if every coil in his body was contracting, yet that wasn't the case. He realized that he was getting smaller and was too stunned to move.

"I-Is this-the curse!?" X cried.

He realized that not only was he shrinking in size, but he was also regressing in age. This terrified the reploid! Alas, there was nothing he could do to stop the regression, and by the time it ended, he was...
1112.title: Age?

11121.content:
His metal frame continued to shrink, but at a certain point, it felt as if the metal was merely his armormor overtop of his.....flesh!? Did it appear as a result of the regression and/or curse, or was it always there and he merely paid no attention to it? It boggled the now 10 year old reploid's mind. Although X didn't recall ever being a child, he seemed to him that this was case. With each second, his armor felt looser and looser. Some of it fell of and hit the ground!

The poor boy was frightened, as he now reached seven years of "age." This wasn't age as robots saw it, however, but rather age has human's
way of looking at "age." As far as he knew, he was still the same age he was before but simply modeled after a human at a certain age. Though the sudden feeling that he had flesh made him wonder how much of him was mechanical.

His regression finally stopped at eight months old. X was lying on his back in his oversized helmet naked and crying, the rest of his now oversized armor surrounding him. He was confused as to what just happened, yet he knew it wasn't necessarily a good thing. The world around him seemed much bigger and scarier, which caused him to cry more.

Suddenly, he saw_______ walking towards him.
11121.title: an eight month old baby

1112121.content:
Zero was walking down the corridor when he heard the most peculiar thing: a baby's cry. This couldn't be right, since the only beings on this base were reploids, and there was no such thing as a baby reploid, right? Nonetheless, the red chrome plated reploid followed the source of the sound and couldn't believe his eyes. Lying on the ground was a naked baby boy with short, brown, messy hair and crying his eyes. The infant was lying in what appeared to be X's helmet and was surrounded by his armor. Zero could only conclude the worst possible outcome.

"X!?" Zero exclaimed as he picked the boy up.

Zero then proceeded to try and calm X down by rocking him in his arms and shushing him. Thankfully that worked. Suddenly, X began to.......pee on Zero!? Zero never knew reploids could urinate like normal humans, or could they? Whatever the case, he was still disgusted by it.

"Gross!" Zero held X far in front of him.

X then looked at what he was doing and was surprised at what he was doing, He then looked at Zero's reaction and giggled. Finally, X stopped peeing. Zero sighed and looked at X.

"What am I going to do with you?"

X simply smiled and sucked his thumb. Zero smirked.

"Well, you are kinda cute," Zero poked X's little nose, causing the baby to giggle.

He then pondered what to do with X. As far as he knew, there were no diapers or baby care supplies on the base. Also, what would his comrades think? X, their most valued maverick hunter, was now a baby. This sure wasn't going to go over lightly.

He then decided to...
1112121.title: Zero

choices: "I think we might have some supplies lying around."
"We need to go to Earth and buy some supplies."
11121211.content:
Zero decided to tell his Comrades and consult it with them. He held X close and rubbed his back, to which X hugged him in response.

"Dada," he babbled.

This shocked Zero.

"X, you remember my name, right?" Zero inquired.

X nodded.

"Zewo. Dada."

He knew that X looked up to him a lot, but he always thought of it as a mentor-student and/or brother like relationship, not a father and son one. Did X really see it like this, or is it just X's infantile state that was causing this? He decided to let it go for now and focus on getting to the command room.

Once he arrived, he was greeted by odd glances from Alia and Signas.

"Zero, why do you have a baby in your arms?" Signas inquired.

Zero sighed.

"Guys, this baby is X," Zero replied.

Alia and Signas were stunned. Was it even possible for reploids to be babies? This was all rather puzzling.

"So that's.....X!?" Alia asked.

Zero nodded and handed X to Alia. She looked at the smiling infant in her arms and fully realized that the baby was indeed X. Though the prospect of their best maverick hunter being reduced to an infant was nearly terrifying, she couldn't help but smile at the adorable child in her arms.

"Well, at least he's a cutie," Alia poked X's little nose, causing the baby boy to giggle.

X then hugged Alia in response.

"Mama," X babbled.

Alia was shocked by what the infant called her, but she couldn't help but smile at X.

"Aw, he thinks I'm his mommy."

Zero blushed at that statement, but then quickly regained his composure.

"First.things first, we need to get some supplies to care for X until he's back to normal," Zero stated.

Signas replied by saying......
11121211.title: Tell his comrades
